wxPGVariant Class Reference

A specific, lightweight variant class. If you prefer wxVariant, you can always use GetVariant method. More...

wxPGVariantUnion m_v
 Value in portable format.

Detailed Description

A specific, lightweight variant class. If you prefer wxVariant, you can always use GetVariant method.

Remarks:
  • Type mismatch during GetXXX() call causes an error message to be displayed.
